mapper.update:
update notice
isdelete = #{isdelete,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
createUser = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
projectName = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
opening_area = #{opening_area,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
construction = #{construction,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
plot_ratio = #{plot_ratio,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

assessment = #{assessment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
research = #{research,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
source = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
project_summary = #{project_summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
organization = #{organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
intention = #{intention,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
conditions = #{conditions,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cooperation = #{cooperation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

proportion = #{proportion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

instruction = #{instruction,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

is_client = #{is_client,jdbcType=CHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update notice set isdelete = #{isdelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, createUser = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, projectName = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, opening_area = #{opening_area,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, construction = #{construction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, plot_ratio = #{plot_ratio,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, total_area = #{total_area,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, area_of_plot_ratio = #{area_of_plot_ratio,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, assessment = #{assessment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, research = #{research,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, source = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_summary = #{project_summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, organization = #{organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, intention = #{intention,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, conditions = #{conditions,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cooperation = #{cooperation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, benefit = #{benefit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, proportion = #{proportion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deadline = #{deadline,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, instruction = #{instruction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, decision = #{decision,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, plot = #{plot,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enterprise = #{enterprise,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, filename = #{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, payment = #{payment,jdbcType=CHAR}, trading_terms = #{trading_terms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, information = #{information,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, complaint = #{complaint,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fax = #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, weChat_official = #{weChat_official,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_partner = #{is_partner,jdbcType=CHAR}, is_guarantee = #{is_guarantee,jdbcType=CHAR}, is_client = #{is_client,jdbcType=CHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from notice where isdelete=0
and projectName like CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{projectName},'%'))

select n.id, n.isdelete, DATE_FORMAT(n.createtime,'%Y-%m-%d') as createtime, n.createUser, n.projectName, n.opening_area, n.construction, n.plot_ratio, n.total_area, n.area_of_plot_ratio, n.assessment, n.research, n.source, n.project_summary, n.organization, n.intention, n.conditions, n.cooperation, n.benefit, n.proportion, n.deadline, n.instruction, n.decision, n.plot, n.enterprise, n.filename, n.payment, n.trading_terms, n.information, n.complaint, n.fax, n.url, n.weChat_official, n.address, n.is_partner, n.is_guarantee, n.is_client, f.name, f.address faddress from notice n left join file f on n.assessment = f.batch_no where n.isdelete=0
